## Discussion

This property contains the maximum walking steadiness value for the classification. It contains an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] instance with a percentage value between `0.0` and `1.0`.

# minimum

**Instance Property**

The maximum walking steadiness percentage for the classification.

## Declaration

```swift
var minimum: HKQuantity { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the maximum walking steadiness value for the classification. It contains an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] instance with a percentage value between `0.0` and `1.0`.
title: minimum
